description: Try our easy to follow Coffee Kisses recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coffee Kisses Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine coffee powder, coffee liqueur (optional) and boiling water in a small bowl. Set aside to cool.
Using electric mixers, beat thickened cream and icing sugar together in a small bowl until thick. Fold in coffee mixture.
Spoon a little coffee cream mixture onto half a vanilla mini meringue. Top with remaining meringues. Dust with a little extra coffee powder and serve.
